result.execSummary:
The defendant Cassandra S Montonya was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Defendant is not to consume or possess alcohol.  Do not enter premises where alcohol is primary business, any bars taverns or liquor stores.

 No possession or use of mind altering substances, or illicit substances without a valid prescription.
May be eligible for expunction upon successful completion of case.

Defendant Cassandra S Montonya in court with attorney Kari S. Hoel.  Defendant Cassandra S Montonya in custody.  James D Babbitt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 15CF104-sentencing after revocation.  Also with 17CF22, 17CF23.  Atty would like to proceed with the sentencing after revocation.  Argument entered by both sides.  

15CF30-4 months jail.  


15CF104- 4 month jail on each count.  All concurrent.  Will have huber, will have good time. Civil Judgment for unpaid fines.

Defendant Cassandra S Montonya in court with attorney Annette M Barna.  James D Babbitt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 15CF104, 15CF117.  Court recites case settlement into the court record.  Court instructs on plea questionnaire/waiver of rights.  

15CF30-amend.  DE will enter a plea of NC, court will accept and find the DE guilty.  

15CF104-DE will enter a plea to Ct's 3 and 3.  Ct's 1 and 4 will be DRI.  

15CF117-DRI

15CM40-DRI

Court will accept the recommendations of the parties.  

15CF30-Withhold sentence, 2 years probation.  Will comply with all AODA provisions, no possession or consumption of illicit substances,  pay restitution of $220.00, CC, will be eligible for expunction upon successful completion of case.  

15CF104-Withhold sentence, 2 years probation, CC, 40 hours community service, will be eligible for expunction upon successful completion of case.  Three days credit.
